questionTitle: If you .................. a choice, which country would you visit?
Trees won't grow .................. there is enough water.
If I had taken that English course, I .................. much progress.

In 1966, my brother .................. at Havard university.

shoes are always of various types.

Here is .................. girl we are talking about.
